mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_status, user_id, order_date, end_date, send_addr) values ( #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(order_date,INTERVAL "1 1" DAY_HOUR), #{sendAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_addr = #{sendAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_status, user_id, order_date, end_date, send_addr from orders where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
